title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description:If key is blank, externalized text can't be displayed in chart.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart's title.
EB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart's title.
SR: To reproduce:1. Open the properties file.2. Leave the key blank.3. Add the chart and check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart's title.
